name: Grants Galore
title: Generous Grant Receipts
description: In 2022, Grenada received $1,860,000 in grants, marking a significant contribution to its economy. This highlights the country's ability to attract international financial support.

name: Aid Anomaly
title: Negative Net ODA
description: Grenada experienced a negative net ODA of -8.19% of GNI and -10.49% of imports in 2022, indicating a unique financial situation where the country is providing more aid than it receives.

name: Per Capita Paradox
title: Negative ODA Per Capita
description: In 2022, Grenada's net ODA per capita was -$800.94, suggesting a rare scenario where the nation is contributing more aid per person than it receives.

name: Trade Triumph
title: Complete Binding Coverage
description: Grenada achieved a 100% binding coverage for primary products in 2022, showcasing its commitment to international trade agreements and tariff regulations.
